text: Got all the parts to work together yesterday. After out meeting with ZGF, we ended up deciding to only use one of the distance sensors + the capacitance sensor.
Thanks <@U0H4SJN11> Did you discuss what that sensor will acomplish?
Yes, as only to detect someone directly in front of the podium. Still need that meeting with DDD to discuss it further.

Ok cool. But you and Elise thinking the detect someone in front of the podium to aid the capacitive touch or will there be an interaction that occurs when someone triggers the sensor (e.g. increased brightness)?
Not positive what yet, but some kinda of light “bounce” or streak
And to confirm, the 2 sensors are now registering interaction?
The capacitive touch sensor + the distance sensor?

The capacitive touch sensor still is the only sensor that measures direct interaction. The distance sensor is there for a preliminary interaction that draws the user’s attention to the part that we are trying to get them to touch
Well proximity is a form of interaction :stuck_out_tongue:, but I'm picking up what you're putting down. So those 2 sensors are sending data though?
